title: 2022 Week 6 Preview: Game Picks and Locks of the Week
itunes:title: 2022 Week 6 Preview: Game Picks and Locks of the Week
description:
A room filled with some heroes - Dan Hanzus, Marc Sessler and Gregg Rosenthal preview all the games on the Week 6 slate, starting with the primetime matchups: Cowboys at Eagles (2:35) and Broncos at Chargers (10:09). Then, we begin the draft with the game of the year, Bills at Chiefs (18:53) and preview the rest of the games: Jets at Packers (29:11), Patriots at Browns (35:22), 49ers at Falcons (42:01), Ravens at Giants (45:16), Bengals at Saints (55:18), Buccaneers at Steelers (1:00:01), Cardinals at Seahawks (1:03:58), Panthers at Rams (1:09:07), Vikings at Dolphins (1:14:32), and finally Jaguars at Colts (1:22:53). Each of the heroes makes their lock of the week pick, and we have a chance for redemption from the Cincinnati Zoo.

Note: timecodes approximate.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
